lead_paragraph: Florida Atlantic University announced that the GEO Group Foundation, the charitable arm of the private prison corporation, planned to withdraw a $6 million gift to name its stadium.
snippet: Florida Atlantic University announced that the GEO Group Foundation, the charitable arm of the private prison corporation, planned to withdraw a $6 million gift to name its stadium.
